trans-unit.source: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations.
trans-unit.target: Gera mapeamentos internos para os tipos de .NET Framework para declarações de elemento do esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Expands upon <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension" /> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets created for .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Expande mediante a <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension" /> para fornecer funcionalidades adicionais para conjuntos de dados tipados criados para o .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` calls the protected constructor of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to generate typed datasets for the .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.
trans-unit.target: `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` chama o construtor protegido do <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> para gerar conjuntos de dados tipados para o .NET Framework versão 3.5 e habilitar o LINQ to DataSet e atualização hierárquica.

trans-unit.source: LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: LINQ to DataSet e atualização hierárquica são recursos que foram adicionados em [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
Consulte também [visão geral de atualização hierárquica](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6) e [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35" />.

trans-unit.source: Expands upon <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Expande <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> para fornecer funcionalidade adicional para datasets tipados para o .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35> calls the protected constructor of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to generate typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35> chama o construtor protegido do <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> para gerar conjuntos de dados tipados para o .NET Framework versão 3.5 e habilitar o LINQ to DataSet e atualização hierárquica.

trans-unit.source: LINQ to Dataset and hierarchical update are features in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: LINQ to Dataset e atualização hierárquica são recursos no [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
Consulte [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md) e [visão geral da atualização hierárquica](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6).
